info.title: Investor Saham Pemula Web API
info.description: The Back-End of Investor Saham Pemula Website.

200.description: **OK**. Returns the access token and the refresh token.

get.description: Get an admin by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The admin id which must match the **Nano ID** format.

404.description: **Not Found**. If the admin does not exist.

get.description: Get articles by perform filtering and sorting optionally.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter the articles by the title that match the `search` keywords. If there are no any article matched, an empty array will be returned.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort the articles by `date` or `title`. Default: `date`

Default.description: If there are articles matched, an array of articles will be returned.

value.title: Lorem Ipsun
value.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Empty Array.description: If there are no articles matched, an empty array will be returned.

patch.description: Update an article by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The article id which must match the **Nano ID** format.

Update Content Only.description: Update the content of the article.

get.description: Get a branch by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The branch id which must match the **Nano ID** format.

404.description: **Not Found**. If the branch is not found.

delete.description: Delete a branch by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The branch id which must match the **Nano ID** format.

200.description: **OK**. If the branch is deleted successfully.

404.description: **Not Found**. If the branch is not found.

BadRequest.description: **Bad Request**. If there are validation errors in the parameters or request body.

Unauthorized.description: **Unauthorized**. If the resource is protected and the user is not authorized to access it.

InternalServerError.description: **Internal Server Error**. If there is any error on the server.
